explanation: [0-0] On a rooftop, a young boy wearing a green T-shirt is standing barefoot on the ground, his head, body, and the ground all covered in water. He is stepping on a black mat, and there is a hand above his head.
[0-5] Then, the water on the ground, in the air, and on the boy's body gathers back into a pink balloon above his head. Finally, the boy looks up at the balloon and smiles.
